website_summaries.verdict: A large accessory set with some unique pieces not found in most other sets.
pros: Includes a pizza pan, cake barrel, skewer rack, metal holder, toast rack, hot dog mold, waffle mold, food clip, silicone brush, plate gripper, gloves, mat, cupcake molds, liners, and magnets, plus a cookbook
cons: Some didn't receive all the pieces, but company sends missing parts

customer_reviews.title: So useful if you love using your air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off with I love my air fryer and thought I couldn't love it anymore until I bought this set. It makes using my air fryer so much easier and better! From the Pre cut parchment paper, magnets that tell you length of time to cook items to the sausage tray...I love every piece of this set! Definitely worth the money if you're like me and use your air fryer multiple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ang Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Many accessories for my air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make more yummy food with my air fryer. I selected this accessories kit since it has so many different items. I've used all of them for so many things- wings, egg rolls, a cake, chicken and burgers! The magnetic cook times is helpful, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased an air fryer, these accessories worked so well helping me become effective and efficient cooking dinner and clean up in record time getting on to the rest of my evening. The nonstick features are excellent with my cheesecakes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION! Oven mitts (and potentially all silicon trays) should not be used!
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says, the oven mitts that come in this kit should not be used. When I removed rack from my air fryer with these mitts, I noticed that they were getting warm and soon too hot to hold. I dropped the rack looked at the mitts and noticed that the contact points had melted onto the rack. Given the poor quality of these silicon mitts, and the inability to use them for their original intent, I'm skeptical about using any other silicon trays this product came with. Use at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Han

customer_reviews.title: Awesome supplements to an already great product 🤩
customer_reviews.text: These are great for making my air fryer even more versatile 😍 I originally just bought for the silicone baking cups Bc it was such a great deal, and now the possibilities are endless when it comes to mealtime 😋
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for my 5.8 Qt air fryer. I love the accessories! Great to use the rack when you have an over flow of what you are making in the basket. There are so many pieces that you can be creative in using one or two in the same cooking event, the silicone mats are very useful- one of those items I didn't know i needed and now I could not do without it. I have also used the plain rack - I put broccoli below and salmon on the rack, and it worked perfectly. The pieces were very well made and super easy to clean. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AngelSmitherman

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be everything I ever needed in an air-fryer but didn't realize.
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping to make my air fryer cooking better. It did just that. You do not have to have all these extras but it really helps things come out better or clean up faster. I have used the fryer at least twice as much with these extra items to make it better and more convenient. All the tools are well made and seem to fit mostair-fryers. I like them a bunch
customer_reviews.author: T. Marcus Allen

customer_reviews.title: Upped my Air Fryer Game
customer_reviews.text: 14 pieces was the best deal I could find on amazon. 10ish of these pieces are game changers for my air fryer. Definitely seeing the improvement in the quality of the food cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I can cook everything I want without cranking up the ole big oven
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans work beautifully with this air fryer in the photo that I purchased online at Walmart. They not only fit perfectly but so very quick clean up! Now I can make biscuits, cinnamon rolls, yeast rolls and even a pan of corn bread! I’m a southerner so that’s very important! lol You will NOT be disappointed with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ann

customer_reviews.title: Silicone melted do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Silicone already melted on first use!! No customer service number do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to bake with your air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Great items to have for an air fryer, has everything you need, quality and durable pieces
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to need some of these items for my new air fryer, but I have yet to actually use them. I love my fryer but just haven’t ventured into the more involved recipes that call for these tools. Nonetheless the set is excellent and I’m very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kojika55

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a very inclusive set
customer_reviews.text: This set has a good variety of items. I bought it to get more use out of my air fryer, which is a GoWiseUSA, 5.8 quart. The items fit well and seem to be well made. I especially like to use the pizza pan for roasting a small amount of walnuts and pecans. With these accessories, I'm more motivated to use the air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not so good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The Silicone glove melted with heat and burned my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas Vernekar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a lot for such a low price. I was a little nervous it wasn’t going to work with mine but I’ve used it for so many meals already. If you air fry and instant pot this is a must have
customer_reviews.author: KailyH

customer_reviews.title: perfect for all you get!
customer_reviews.text: A must have! I wanted to bake, make my omelets in my air fryer and well this bundle definitely is what I needed.... all that comes with it, perfect no longer will need my stove or big oven
customer_reviews.author: Short Straight White Party Bobo Wig

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. They are a lil small for my air fryer but still worl perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stac

customer_reviews.title: Great add on
customer_reviews.text: Great add on for air fryer, increase cooking options and easy clean ups
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I am doing a lot of air frying and this product provides a variety of useful ways to air fry. Using the wire grill with the pizza pan, keeps the meat drippings from falling through the basket for easy cleaning. I used the cake pan and was happy with the results (using a round parchment paper was a BIG help).
customer_reviews.author: LEON J SHAEFER

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs for baking and cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Just what i need for my baking and cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and I have already put the items to good use. Would have given 5 stars but the oven mits melted
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Most items are great
customer_reviews.text: Likes that it all fit in our air fryer. I was surprised when the pot holders melted!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as rustoleum.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it all. Works perfectly. No runs drips or errors.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: 18 pc cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I love my set so much I ordered a second set
customer_reviews.author: Marian D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed as the arrival date was shown and I actually received my purchase 6 day sooner than stated. I can not wait to use my new purchase and will continue to use this company and Amazon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! I have been using it every day si nce I got it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Marcano

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! Great price too! So many accessories I have not used them all yet, but I will!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, everything I need for air frying.
customer_reviews.author: Charlease Trueblood

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 18 piece and didn't even get all the stuff in the 16th. Didn't get adjustment for the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: ruth a.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is the perfect companion for my Gowise 5.8 air fryer...everything is well made and fits perfectly! I can now cook an entire breakfast, eggs, hash browns, biscuits & sausage link at the same time...that is only one example. This set creates more space & options...taking my air frying to the next level & saving time. Thank you for an amazingly versatile set with lots of extras
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Use the pot holders for anything HOT!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of the items, but this was so bad I needed to at least give others a heads up. The little silicone pot holders DO NOT TOLERATE NORMAL OVEN temps. I tried to pull a cake out of a 350 degree oven and the melted onto the pan in the less than 5 seconds it took me to grab it and put the pan down on the counter. That said, the other items look OK, but I have not tried them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Merbird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Air Fryer Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased these accessories for my air fryer. I can literally cook anything in it now and my regular oven stays spotless. If you have an air fryer, these accessories are a necessity. I love their durability, how easy they are to clean, and how they don’t take up much space in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: More than I need or will ever use.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I. I might need some of these so I got the set. Out of I think 20 pieces I’ll only use 5. It was really a waste.
customer_reviews.author: WhyNot

customer_reviews.title: Tongs broke first day of usage. Expect more to follow
customer_reviews.text: I used the tongs to pick up a piece of pork and it broke. I expect other items will follow suit and break easily.
customer_reviews.author: An V. Le

customer_reviews.title: Awesome airfryer accessories.
customer_reviews.text: If you have air fryer do you self a big favor and buy these, they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tina D

customer_reviews.title: Beginners dream!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very versatile and easy to use. Rescues me from the cleanup nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Air Fryer Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a birthday gift for my mother to go along with the air fryer I bought her. They’re the perfect size and work incredibly well! She absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Air fryer Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use in my new Air fryer , bought 2 of these for both of my sons and they loved them so bought myself one. Lots of handy accessories' . I'm excited about getting started to use them ! My faves are the hot dog cooker and the slice bread to toast holder ! It's got just about everything you need to use your air fryer !!! This was my 3rd purchase for this product !
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Essential accessories
customer_reviews.text: Essential accessories for your air fryer so you can take advantage of all it's capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very useful items.
customer_reviews.text: A great collection of items that make the air fryer easier to use. Good quality items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All items in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: All items were great. All very iseful. Love the tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa A. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: A real mixed bag--and a warning.
customer_reviews.text: There's so much in this kit that I have not begun to use all that is included, and some of it I will never use because it overlaps with tools I already have or is not needed for stuff I make. I do want to say I really like what they are calling a universal plate-dish gripper. Very useful. As are the tongs. But I want to warn everyone to be careful about using the mitts. They melted some, and my hand was slightly burned when i used them to grip a hot pan. I have others that do fine, but the ones included are too thin. Pictures attached showing used mitt next to unused for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use a coupon code making these extremely cheap, otherwise, I am not sure I would have bought it. the fingertips oven mitts melted, the tong coverings melted. some items I have not used at all.
customer_reviews.author: mommamerri

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This accessories set for my basket air fryer expanded the use of my Emeril 4.& at AF. I can stack layers , make cupcakes, hotdogs, cakes, fish, etc. love it. Was thinking of get bigger AF but with these accessories I can expand the amount of food put in AF.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Cookbook not extremely helpful for accessories provided
customer_reviews.text: I rated only 4 stars because tje cookbook and magnets to do not give any guidance for the accessories included, ie; the waffle or hot dog silicones. The whole point is to NOT have to look up online how I should use these.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great collection
customer_reviews.text: I have used every item in this package in the last 2 weeks. All are good quality, great price and came with an extra surprise item. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Dee M.

customer_reviews.title: So many accessories I can’t decide what to use first.
customer_reviews.text: So many accessories included! I will most likely not use them all but well worth the money (I had a 50% off code when I ordered). These products will definitely expand the type of items I cook in my air fryer. I am most excited to try the silicon cupcake holders for muffins. I have already used the black “trivet” to sit my air fryer basket on when it is hot, many times.
customer_reviews.author: d. nance

customer_reviews.title: Work really well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described, nice kit! The accessories just wanted what I needed to make my Air Fryer more versatile to use. At the same time I hated frozen chicken tenders I was heated up a can of corn in the cake pot, sitting on a rack. Very handy indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality products. Cookbook leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: No manual in box to which each piece was for. I had to look back on the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great and useful product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my air fryer it came with nothing but the device and I soon realized that having a pan or two would be beneficial. This product came along just at the right time and is very versatile. It also helps in that I don’t have to clean the tray of my fryer as often cause everything is cooked in the pans. I’m so glad I bought this set!
customer_reviews.author: Daranhatu

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. She likes it with the airfryer.
customer_reviews.author: john t  henton

customer_reviews.title: Products will melt in your air fryer - be careful
customer_reviews.text: These products are not made for air fryers - the silicone melts - it got all over the racks and was hard to come off - but, they're awfully cute - don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the bigger 7 qt air fryer....but way too small.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of accessories in this, but really misleading when it says it "fits" the bigger models. It feels like it actually shrinks the size of your Air Fryer because they are just too small. They do fit perfectly in my pressure cooker so I am just going to use them for that. But not for my air fryer. Also, the mits melted when trying to remove the included rack out of my Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Tx8606

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use the rubber pot holders. They’ve melted on my hands from the heat. Watch the silicone things
customer_reviews.author: Michele

product_meta.title: Air Fryer Accessories 18 PCS with Recipe Cookbook Liners for GoWISE Ninja COSORI Cozyna Philips 5.3, 5.5, 5.8, 6 Qt Dishwasher Safe BPA Free, Matte Gold
feature_bullets: Include What You Need - 8” Pizza Pan, 7.5” Cake Barrel, 8” Multipurpose Skewers Rack, 8” Metal Holder, 7” of Toast Rack, 100 pcs 8”5 Air Fryer Liners (Anti-Stick Paper), 3 of Magnets Sets, 1 of Hot Dog Mold, 1 of Food Clip, 1 of Silicone Oil Brush, 1 of Plate Gripper, 7” Silicone Mat, 6 pcs Silicone Cupcake Molds, pair of gloves(not silicone). And an air fryer Recipe Cookbook.

Our air fryer accessories are using certified material, those are 100% safe and healthier. Bake favorite cake in the Cake Barrel, cook delicious pizza in the Pizza Pan, maximize cooking surface with the Metal Holder and make skewers with the Rack! Bake desserts in Muffin Cups, protect your hands from heat with the Oven Mitts and protect your table surfaces with the Silicone Mat. Enjoy your healthy cooking time!

Perfect Fit for Most Brands XL Air Fryer - These accessories perfect fit for the Gowise USA, Philips, Cozyna and more XL air fryers (5.2qt to 6.8qt). The size of the cake basket is 7.5 inches and the pizza plate is 8 ". Other accessories are all universal models.

Dishwasher Available - They are easy to clean by the dishwasher. The pizza pan and cake basket was cover with Teflon, which is heat-resistant, non-viscous, and durable. Matte texture to avoid adhesion of food residue, grease, and dust. Silicone kits can withstand temperatures up to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, but avoid contact with flames. The gloves is not made for silicone, please wait the cookware cool down and use it.

Expand Your Cooking Dishes - If you love your Air Fryer, imagine that you can make more culinary masterpieces with our accessories set! Bake your favorite cake in the Cake Barrel, cook delicious pizza in the Pizza Pan, maximize your cooking surface with the Metal Holder and make skewers with the Multi-Purpose Rack! The newest recipe will help you cook more dishes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
